Class ShapeObject

PyMOLObject --+
              |
             ShapeObject
Known Subclasses:
  • Cone
  • , Cube
  • , Cylinder
  • , Line
  • , Sphere

Graphics objects representing geometrical shapes

This is an abstract base class. Use one of the subclasses to generate graphics.
